item.title: Lantern
item.description:
INTRODUCTION

Is it Linux? I’m not so sure… 🤔

Lantern, the third box in HTB’s Season 6 Heist, claims to be a Linux box, but in most respects actually it’s actually running things as one might in Windows. It isn’t until the very end of privesc to root that we find anything Linux-specific. Lantern is about a generic IT services company running a landing page and an admin panel. What made this one a little special is its extensive use of Blazor.
